descriptionHtml:
this little mod is a remake of what might be my favorite house mod that I ever made for my self for skyrim.
its small but cozy and has all of my characters needs and also is more fitting to my theme. I know in our world witches live in pretty places but in elder scrolls that's not the case. its more like fairy tale witches or so I believe and so I always make my witch houses for elder scroll games like such.

the house is up top of winterhold collage, as why wouldn't it be? if you're a spell caster of any type and can make portals why wouldn't you make one that opens up there? anyway the house has a kitchen with a cooking pot and oven, also a library with an alchemy workbench and an enchanting workbench. there is a bedroom with a staff enchanter, and a lot of storage containers all around but none look out of place. the house has a lot of animation makers, and a lot of cool things around and about to give it a haunted or enchanted feel to it. all it needs is a witch player to own it and a pet black cat.
I did want to post this mod up last Halloween for you guys but I didn't have dragonborn dlc at that time now I do and it made the house look a lot better from my point of view. anyway hope you like and happy Halloween.


(the optional update places a cabin for the house in the world space, because a few people wanted it. it has a map marker and fast travel point. the location is in the swamp of Morthal. if you download the optional file it will no longer have a portal to the mage collage. btw you need the main file to use the optional update because it has all the meshes and textures.)



you can also get this in with a french translation by [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2235573-oaristys/][color=#ffffff]Oaristys[/color][/url] here
http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/bordeciel/habitations/maison_de_sorciere


Credits
oaristys - Modders Resource Pack
runspect - Resources for modders
Blary - Alchemy Clutter Resource
Blary - BookSets Resource
badgremlin - BadGremlins Witches Festival Resources
they are all resources so that should be no problem and i don't think I've used anything from any other mods besides those, other clutter and such should be from the game it self unless im mistaken.
author: JackalX137
